{{Stub|Complete Stage and their stages as subpages}}
Players can be invited at the Invitation Board after reaching the required [[Player Level]] and using a {{Item|Match Invitation Letter}}. [[Genius Invokation TCG/Stage/Diluc|Diluc]], [[Genius Invokation TCG/Stage/Kaeya|Kaeya]], [[Genius Invokation TCG/Stage/Sucrose|Sucrose]], and [[Genius Invokation TCG/Stage/Fischl|Fischl]] do not require a Match Invitation Letter.

[[Inazuma]] characters cannot be invited until {{Quest|Radiant Sakura}} is complete.
